'''White Chestnut Oak Wood''' is a type of [[Wood]] that is obtained by cutting down White Chestnut Oak Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
White Chestnut Oak Wood can be found on [[Coatepec Mountain]] and east of the [["Children of Echoes"]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=646 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
